name: AI ESCAPE
description:
Description

You play as an AI trying to escape the lab he's in and see the sun.

You can swap between different robots, and gain certain powers based on what kind of robot you swap into.

Submission for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

-----

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Swap/Shoot/Explode
developers: Duck In A Top Hat Games
